controller.moveHandler

Interface IMoveHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMoveHandler, BishopMoveHandler, KingMoveHandler, KnightMoveHandler, PawnMoveHandler, QueenMoveHandler, RookMoveHandler

    public interface IMoveHandler
    Classes with this interface can check and translate move from a specific type.
    Author:
    Bj√∂rn Hullmann

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FigureType getFigureType()
      Get the FigureType for which this MoveHandler is
      boolean hasFigureATurnFor(Point from)
      Check if the specific figure type has a turn on the actual game field
      boolean isItAValidMove(Move move)
      Check for a figure if it is a valid move.
      MoveInPointFigurePairs translateMove(Move move)
      Translate the move in MoveInPointFigurePairs

    • Method Detail

      • isItAValidMove

        boolean isItAValidMove(Move move)
        Check for a figure if it is a valid move. This not only check if he can hit the king. It not check if the king is after this in check.
        Parameters:
        move - The move which should be check.
        Returns:
        true if it a valid move

      • translateMove

        MoveInPointFigurePairs translateMove(Move move)
        Translate the move in MoveInPointFigurePairs
        Parameters:
        move - the move which should be translated
        Returns:
        The MoveInPointFigurePairs object where every position change is set

      • getFigureType

        FigureType getFigureType()
        Get the FigureType for which this MoveHandler is
        Returns:
        The FigureType for which this is

      • hasFigureATurnFor

        boolean hasFigureATurnFor(Point from)
        Check if the specific figure type has a turn on the actual game field
        Parameters:
        from - the position where the figure stand
        Returns:
        true if the figure have a turn
